com.btmatthews.atlas.jcr

Interface SessionFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PooledSessionFactory, SimpleSessionFactory

    public interface SessionFactory
    A factory that provides session objects used to interact with the Java Content Repository.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Brian Thomas Matthews

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.jcr.Session getSession(String workspaceName)
      Get a session for the named workspace.
      void releaseSession(String workspaceName, javax.jcr.Session session)
      Release a session for the named workspace.

    • Method Detail

      • getSession

        javax.jcr.Session getSession(String workspaceName)
                      throws Exception
        Get a session for the named workspace.
        Parameters:
        workspaceName - The workspace name.
        Returns:
        The session.
        Throws:
        Exception - If there was an error obtaining a session.

      • releaseSession

        void releaseSession(String workspaceName,
                    javax.jcr.Session session)
             throws Exception
        Release a session for the named workspace.
        Parameters:
        workspaceName - The workspace name.
        session - The session.
        Throws:
        Exception - If there was an error releasing the session.
